projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A weather application with the ability to toggle between four different cities. It shows a picture of the cities in the background. You can also see the next 5 days forecast.

projects.name: Quiz
projects.description: A groupproject where we chose to make a little quiz about ourselfs. First you have to enter your information to get to the quiz and you get all the answers in the about page.

projects.name: Recipe Library
projects.description: A simple site with recipes fetched by an API. I followed a design as closely as possible and just integrated the API. It was focus on beeing able to sort and filter the different recipes.
